health_tech: X12 transaction sets (specifically 270/271 for eligibility inquiries and responses)
FHIR API for patient data exchange

evidence.claim: Acera Health utilizes AWS services for its infrastructure, which supports HIPAA compliance and secure data storage.
The company implements FHIR standards for its health data interoperability, facilitating integration with EHR systems.
Acera Health's platform allows real-time data processing and transaction handling using X12 transaction sets.
The integration of RESTful APIs enables seamless connectivity with external systems within the healthcare ecosystem.
They mention their commitment to data security and compliance with HIPAA regulations in their framework, outlining their infrastructure choices.

icp.icp_reason: Uses X12 transactions, offers HIPAA compliance, and values API automation in healthcare.
